function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limitations of population-level approach to vector control and lack of consideration for individual-level personal protection","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Wider range of suitable habitats for mosquito populations due to climate change","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Expanding urbanization, international travel, trade, and population growth contributing to potential for mosquito-borne disease outbreak","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to infectious agents","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High agent exposure times","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of transparency in the model-agnostic design may lead to inaccurate risk assessment.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of real-world variability in occupant behavior and building characteristics may lead to inaccurate exposure assessments.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate simulation of agent interactions may lead to underestimation of occupant exposure in confined spaces.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sensitivity of the exposed model to user assumptions for occupant exposure and k-multiplier","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate representation of human movement in crowd models may lead to underestimation of disease transmission","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for individual attributes in crowd models can result in higher exposure of vulnerable individuals","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Universal application of exposed to any pedestrian crowd models","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Application of exposed in informing building design and minimizing occupant exposure","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Retrofitting existing crowd models may lead to errors in occupant exposure assessments during pandemics.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on assumptions concerning disease transmissions may lead to inaccurate occupant exposure assessments.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Heavy dependence on existing crowd models and assumptions may limit the accuracy and applicability of the occupant exposure assessments.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure time between 0 and 5 minutes for each individual agent to a given number of agents in the building","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Identifying the maximum number of people that agents are exposed to at the same time","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Average and standard deviations of the time of exposures to each number of people provide valuable information for quantitative risk assessment","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to contagious diseases due to contact with different numbers of agents in a built environment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear restrictions on building occupancy","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure by face-to-face contact within a social between pedestrians in confined spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to contagious diseases through face-to-face contact within social distance risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive sub-models in crowd models for performing occupant exposure analysis","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to assess the impact of disease spread in confined spaces without microscopic crowd models","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on macroscopic epidemiological models","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for individual mobility risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent social distancing recommendations in different countries","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of data to fully support
